product_name: Kingston FURY Beast 32GB DDR5 6000MHz RGB Desktop RAM

descriptions.title: Kingston FURY Beast 32GB DDR5 6000MHz RGB Desktop RAM
descriptions.details: Kingston FURY Beast 32GB DDR5 6000MHz RGB Desktop RAM is made for next-generation gaming platforms. This memory module not only delivers exceptional speed but also offers increased capacity and reliability. DDR5 introduces several enhanced features, including on-die ECC (ODECC) for superior stability at extreme speeds, dual 32-bit sub-channels for enhanced efficiency, and an on-module power management integrated circuit (PMIC) that ensures power is distributed where it's needed most. Kingston FURY Beast 32GB DDR5 6000MHz RAM features superior speed advancements, doubling the number of banks from 16 to 32 and the burst length from 8 to 16. Whether you're pushing the boundaries of gaming with the most demanding settings, engaging in 4K+ live streaming, or handling resource-intensive tasks like large animations and 3D rendering, Kingston FURY Beast DDR5 memory delivers the performance boost you need while seamlessly combining style with substance. Kingston FURY Beast 32GB DDR5 6000MHz RGB Desktop RAM support Intel XMP 3.0 or AMD EXPO, including customizable profiles for speeds and timings.

descriptions.title: Corsair VENGEANCE 32GB DDR5 5200MHz C40 RAM
descriptions.details: The Corsair VENGEANCE 32GB DDR5 5200MHz C40 RAM is a high-performance memory module that allows you to push the limits of your system like never before. With DDR5 technology, it offers faster frequencies, greater capacities, and improved overall performance compared to previous generations of RAM. The DDR5 memory ensures that your high-end CPU can access data quickly and efficiently, enhancing your system's overall responsiveness. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or multi-tasker who constantly has numerous applications and browser tabs open, this RAM allows your PC to power through complex tasks faster than ever before. The Corsair VENGEANCE DDR5 RAM is its built-in voltage regulation and iCUE software control. This combination enables easier and more precise output tuning, resulting in more stable overclocking. You have the power and control to fine-tune your system's performance according to your needs and preferences. This RAM module supports Custom Intel XMP 3.0 profiles. This feature eliminates the need for manually adjusting performance settings every time you want to optimize your system. By saving your own XMP profiles through the iCUE software, you can easily customize and tailor your settings by application or task, maximizing efficiency and ensuring optimal performance for different use cases. The Corsair VENGEANCE 32GB DDR5 5200MHz C40 RAM is designed to deliver exceptional performance and speed, allowing you to unleash the full potential of your system. With its DDR5 technology, built-in voltage regulation, and support for custom XMP profiles, this RAM module provides a seamless and efficient experience for gamers, content creators, and multi-task alike.

product_name: G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM

descriptions.title: G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM
descriptions.details: The G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM is a high-performance memory module built for desktop PCs. It has a capacity of 32GB and is designed with DDR5 memory. This RAM module is built for speed and performance, with a tested speed of 6000 MT/s and a tested latency of 32-38-38-96. To function properly, the G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM requires a voltage of 1.40V. It is unbuffered and non-ECC, making it perfect for professional or high-performance gaming. The SPD speed is 4800 MT/s, and the voltage is set to 1.10V by default. The G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM is Intel XMP 3.0 (Extreme Memory Profile) Compatible, which is one of its notable qualities. This implies that it has been verified and certified to operate with Intel-based motherboards that support XMP, making it simple and quick to configure the RAM's performance parameters. The G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 32GB DDR5 6000MHz Desktop RAM offers RGB illumination that can be configured to fit the aesthetics of your computer design, in addition to its amazing performance specs. Overall, this RAM module is an excellent option for gamers, content creators, and professionals that want exceptional speed and dependability from their computer's memory.

descriptions.details: The new Trident Z Royal is the latest addition to the Trident Z flagship family and features a crown jewel design.
